Radiographers Locum Job Agency

If you meet the requirements for UK Radiographers jobs, register with PJ Locums to generate your CV. If successful, we will contact you to arrange an appointment on arrival in the UK.

Details:

PJ Locums prides itself on being recognised as a professional provider of Locum Radiographers to NHS Hospitals, Community Clinics as well as Private Hospitals throughout the UK.

Overseas candidates including EU members are required to register with the HPC in order to work in the UK, as this can take 2 - 3 months and therefore it is advisable to start the process before arriving in the UK. See the link below for HPC Contact details.

Our specialist consultants recruit Radiographers from the UK and internationally, matching individuals skills and experiences with customers needs, across both locum and permanent roles. A full police check is required prior to arrival in the U.K.

Locum Areas of Speciality for Radiographers:

  • MRI
  • CT
  • Diagnostic Radiography
  • General X-Ray
  • Ultrasound
  • Mammography
  • Angiography
  • Cardiac Radiography
  • Nuclear Medicine
  • Radiotherapy
